body.p:
University of Pennsylvania.
ONE HUNDRED AND THIRTY-FIRST ANNUAL
COMMENCEMENT
FOR
CONFERRING DEGREES IN ARTS, SCIENCE, PHILOSOPHY,
MUSIC, LAW, AND VETERINARY MEDICINE,
AT THE
AMERICAN ACADEMY OF MUSIC,

p.emph: On Wednesday, June 8th, 1887, at 11 o'clock A. M.

body.p: The Music, by the GERMANIA ORCHESTRA (Ch. M. Schmitz, Conductor), will begin at 10.30 A. M.

CONCERT OVERTURE . . . . . . . . Hummel.
VALSE MILITAIRE . . . . . . . . Waldtuefel.
SELECTIONS, "A Night in Venice" . . . . . . . . . Strauss.
OVERTURE, "Yelva" . . . . . . . Reissiger.
MARCH, "Alexander" . . . . . . . Weingarten.
PROCESSION--Governor, Provost, Trustees, Faculties, Invited Guests, Graduates.
PRAYER.
Rt. Rev. O. W. WHITAKER, D.D.
BACHELOR'S ORATION . . . . . . . OLIVER HUCKEL.
"The Republic of the Twentieth Century."
SELECTIONS, "Carmen" . . . . . . . Biset.
LAW ORATION . . . . . . . WILLIAM W. SMITHERS.
"Diffusion of National Sentiments."
MASTER'S ORATION . . . . . . . . JOHN AUGUST WILLIAM HAAS (excused).
BOLERO . . . . . . . Mosskowsky.
CONFERRING OF DEGREES.
ANNOUNCEMENT OF HONORS AND PRIZES.
ARIA, "The Maid of Artois" . . . . . . . . Balfe.
VALEDICTORY ORATION . . . . GEORGE WHARTON PEPPER, B.A.
BENEDICTION.
GALOP, "For Fame and Fortune" . . . . . . Wiegand.

THE DEGREE OF BACHELOR OF ARTS will be conferred on--
WILLIAM ALLEN, JR., CHRISTOPHER MAGEE, JR.,
DAVID WERNER AMRAM, ROBERT STEPHEN MAISON,
WILLIAM SINCALIR ASHBROOK, JAMES ALAN MONTGOMERY,
CHAUNCEY RALSTON BAUGH, HYLAND CLARKE MURPHEY,
EDGAR FRENCH BROWN, WILLIAM ROMAINE NEWBOLD,
CHARLES TYLER COWPERTHWAIT, GEORGE WHARTON PEPPER,
EDWARDS SANFORD DUNN, FRANCIS JOHN PRYOR, JR.,
GEORGE FETTEROLF, THEODORE WOOD REATH,
GEORGE HARRISON FRAZIER, ALEXANDER WILSON RUSSELL, JR.,
FRED. WM. WILSON GRAHAM, ROBERT BOWEN SALTER,
JOHN MCARTHUR HARRIS, ANDRE WILLIAM SEGUIN,
JAMES HAWORTH, HENRY DANIEL EMANUEL SIEBOTT,
CRAWFORD DAWES HENING, HENRY NAGLEE SMALTZ,
OLIVER HUCKEL, JAMES SOMERS SMITH, JR.,
JOSEPH SIEGMUND LEVIN, WITMER STONE,
WALTER RODMAN LINCOLN, GEORGE FLOWERS STRADLING,
WALTER BIDDLE LOWRY, CHARLES COOPER TOWNSEND.
THE DEGREE OF BACHELOR OF PHILOSOPHY will be conferred on--
FORREST MURRELL ANDERSON, CLEMENT ACTON GRISCOM, JR.,
WILLIAM FRANCIS AUDENRIED, SAMUEL FREDERIC HOUSTON,
EDWARD CHARLES BATCHELOR, HEW BRYDON MACLEAN,
CHARLES SELIGMAN BERNHEIMER, FRANKWENRICH SHEAFER,
FRANCIS ASHBURY BRUNER, MILES TUCKER,
JOSEPH ALLISON EYSTER, JR., EDWARD LOWBER WELSH.
THE DEGREE OF BACHELOR OF SCIENCE will be conferred on--
HENRY CLAY ADAMS, JAMES FRANCIS MAGEE, JR.,
LOUIS EUGENE AMET, ALBERT LEE MAGILTON,
HENRY PRICE BALL, GEORGE LEDLIE MARTIN,
CHARLES THOS. PARRY BRUNNER, LEVIS PASSMORE NEWLIN,
ALBERT ROWLAND CLINE, WILLIAM BYRD PAGE,
EDGAR PARDEE EARLE, DAVID PEPPER, JR.,
JOSEPH SKETCHLEY ELVERSON, ANDREW PERRY REDIFER,
THOMAS S. R. FLICKWIR, FRANK REMI REMONT,
LEE KAUFER FRANKEL, HOWARD SMITH RICHARDS,

WILLIAM HAHMAN, HENRY HUNTER SEYFERT,
GEORGE BACON HANCOCK, FRANKLIN SHELBE,
WALTER EUGENE HARRINGTON, JAMES REEVES SIDDALL,
JOHN DAWSON HAWKINS, ALFRED HENRY SMITH,
JOHN JULIUS HOVEY, WILLIAM POULTNEY SMITH, JR.,
FRANK JAMES KEELEY, MILTON VALENTINE SNYDER,
EDWARD FULBISTER KENNEY, THEODORE NELSON SPENCER,
LEON KRAFT, DANIEL MORRELL STACKHOUSE,
JNO. PHILIP KRECKER, HORACE AMBROSE STEVER, JR.,
THEOPHILUS KUELLING, JOSEPH CHRISTIAN WAGNER,
THOMAS LOVE LATTA, JOHN WALLACE WEAVER,
CHARLES ROBERT LEE, ALFRED WEEKS, JR.,
LEIGHTON LEE, ALAN DEAN WHITTAKER.
WILLIAM MCLEAN,

THE DEGREE OF BACHELOR OF MUSIC will be conferred on--
PRESON WARE OREM.

CERTIFICATES will be presented--
IN SCIENCE to
LOUIS JOSEPH MATOS, WILLIAM VINCENT MCGRATH, JR.,
FRANK HERRON CAROTHERS, JAMES CLARENCE OGDEN.
IN BIOLOGY to
MILTON J. GREENMAN MARCUS A. WEEMS.
IN FINANCE AND ECONOMY to--
NORTON BUEL YOUNG.
IN MUSIC to
MARGARET G. DEVINE, EVOR WILLIAMS,
ELIZABETH A. REINBOTH, SARA WILSON.
EMMA A. WHITELY,

THE DEGREE OF BACHELOR OF LAWS will be conferred on--
LOUIS A. BIDDLE, HORATIO G. LLOYD, JR.,
RUSSELL T. BOSWELL, ROBERTS LOWRIE,
CHARLES BREMER, JR., ROBERT HUNTER MCGRATH, JR.,
LOUIS P. BRENNAN, J. CRAIG MCLANAHAN,
CHALRES D. BROWN, HENRY A. MCMURROW,
WALTER W. CALMORE, THOMAS W. MCNEIL,
HENRY BRINTON COXE, JR., ABNER H. MERSHON,
MORRIS DALLETT, S. DUFFIELD MITCHELL,
FRANCIS J. DEARY, EVERETT MOON,
ALEXANDER R. DE WITT, ZIBA T. MOORE,
WM. REES EVANS, HARRY P. ORLEMANN,
LEONARD FINLETTER, ALBERT M. OTT,
ROBERT B. FLETCHER, JACOB A. SCHIEDT,
HARRY K. FRIES, LOUIS K. SIGGONS,
W. ROGER FRONEFIELD, HENRY WORTHINGTON SMITH,
JOHN LENTZ GARRETT, WM. W. SMITHERS,
DANIEL GIBBONS, ARTHUR C. SNYDER,
JOHN FRED. HARTMAN, JR., LEWIS STARR,
CALVIN F. HECKLER, JOSEPH T. TAYLOR,
ERNEST H. HUNTER, HENRY TESNOW,
JAMES COLLINS JONES, JOSEPH W. THOMPSON,
SAMUEL HUCKEL KIRKPATRICK, WILLIAM C. WILSON,
FRANK P. KREBS, MILTON C. WORK,
CHARLES KUNI, JR., STUART WYETH.

THE DEGREE OF MASTER OF ARTS will be conferred on--
JOHN AUGUST WILLIAM HAAS, B. A., JOHN MULLEN, B. A.,
JAMES DALLAS STEELE, B. A., ARDEMUS STEWART, B. A.

THE DEGREE OF BACHELOR OF SCIENCES AUXILIARY TO MEDICINE on--
P. FRANKLIN STAHL, PH. G., M.D.
THE DEGREE OF BACHELOR OF DIVINITY will be conferred on--
REV. FRANK S. BALLENTINE, A. M. JOHN AUGUST WM. HAAS, A.M.
THE DEGREE OF PRACTICAL CHEMIST will be conferred on--
ABRAM TRIMBLE EASTWICK, B.S., WILLIAM DANIEL WEIKEL, B.S.
THE DEGREE OF MINING ENGINEER will be conferred on--
AMOS PEASLEE BROWN, JR., B.S., JAMES HARMAR KNIGHT, B.S.,
PERCY MCGEORGE, B.S., MARSHALL ROGERS PUGH, B.S.,
ALFRED WEEKS, B.S., SAMUEL JENNINGS WHITE, B.S.
THE DEGREE OF MECHANICAL ENGINEER will be conferred on--
EDGAR AUGUSTUS ALCOTT, B.S., WILLIAM AUGUSTUS BIGLER, B.S.,
THEODORE GOULD, JR., B.S., THOMAS GRAHAM GRIER, B.S.,
JOSEPH DAVID ISRAEL, B.S., LEON KRAFT, B.S.,
DAVID EDWARD TRACY, B.S., CARL OTTO HERING, B.S.
THE DEGREE OF CIVIL ENGINEER will be conferred on--
THOMAS S. R. FLICKWIR, B.S., HENRY JACKSON MULLEN, B.S.,
WILLIAM SALTER FREEMAN, B.S., EDWARD ARNOTT PEARSON, B.S.,
CHARLES HERMAN HAUPT, B.S., EARL THOMSON, B.S.,
JOSEPH EDWARD HORN, B.S., JOHN WILLIAMSON ZIEGLER, B.S.
FRANCIS EMLEN HOSKINS, B.S.,

THE DEGREE OF DOCTOR OF VETERINARY MEDICINE will be conferred on--
CHARLES M. CULLEN, EDGAR MARLIN,
HIRAM P. EVES, WILLIAM B. MONTGOMERY,
SIMON J. J. HARGER, JOHN F. VANDEGRIFT,
RICHARD W. HICKMAN, RICHARD G. WEBSTER,
CHARLES LINTZ, CHARLES WILLIAMS.

THE HONORARY DEGREE OF DOCTOR OF DIVINITY will be conferred on--
THE REV. GEORGE POMERY ALLEN, THE REV. SAMUEL D. MCCONNELL,
THE REV. EDWARD T. BARTLETT, THE REV. ROBERT ELLIS THOMPSON.

THE HONORARY DEGREE OF DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY will be conferred on--
PROFESSOR JOHN A. RYDER.

THE HONORARY DEGREE OF DOCTOR OF LAWS will be conferred on--
FERDINAND V. HAYDEN, M.D., THE REV. SABATO MORAIS.
